title: Start
body:
<<place california>>{{nullchar}}

[[Begin the struggle |A2]]

title: A2
body:
<<place a2_santabarbara>>

[[Continue |A3A]]

title: A3A
body:
<<place a3a_santabarbara>>{{default}}

[[“Whether all of us wanted to do this or not, it’s bound to happen sooner or later. Anyways, any supplies ought to help us later on” |A3B]]

title: A4A$d@fg:3
body:
<<place a4a_losangeles>>

[[“Head towards Mexico” |A5$e]]

title: A5$e
body:
<<place a5_tijuana>>

[[“It’s for the best to cut ties now before morale worsens. The group decide to split their resource and send them back to Santa Barbara.” |A5%die:3]]
[[“It’s too early to quit now, turning back will only inevitably end in death. The group convinces the stragglers that they must continue their mission if they are to survive.” |A6$d]]

title: A6$d
body:
<<place a6_baja>>

[[Continue |A7$d]]

title: A7$d
body:
<<place a7_california>>

[[“Turn around and take the route towards the Sonora inland. We do not want to take any unnecessary risks” |A8A$e]]
[[“Cut through the gulf, we’ve taken similar detours back in the border, there is no time to waste.” |A8B$e]]

title: A8A$e
body:
<<place a8a_sonora>>

[[“Begin preparations to climb the mountain face” |A8A2%die:1]]

title: A8A2%die:1
body:
<<place a8a2_sonora>>

[[“The group must push on. Their valiance will be remembered.” |A9$e]]

title: A8B$e
body:
<<place a8b_california>>

[[Continue |A8B2%die:1]]

title: A8B2%die:1
body:
<<place a8b2_california>>

[[“The group has to run before engulfing more members. Their courage will forever be remembered” |A9$e]]

title: A9$e
body:
<<place a9_sinaloa>>

[[“The group digs in the snow and sets camp. Some desperately needed rest was needed, and nearly everyone passes out immediately.” |A9A]]

title: A10@bg:3
body:
<<place a10_sinaloa>>

[[“Investigate and enter the bunker” |A11]]

title: A11
body:
<<place a11_sinaloa>>

[[Interrupt him |A12]]

title: A12
body:
<<place a12_sinaloa>>{{bunker_scientist}}

[[“Try to convince the scientist to join our cause. There is nothing left for him here, only death. Perhaps he can find answers at Fortaleza.” |A12&sci@fg:2]]
[[“Continue forwards and respect the man’s mission. We do not have the right to drag him out of his last remaining wishes, especially in this god forsaken world” |A13$e@fg:2]]

title: A3B
body:
<<place a3b_santabarbara>>

[[“Take the bundle of battery rods” |A4A$d@pg:3]]
[[“Take the stash of dried food” |A4A$d@fg:3]]

title: A5%die:3
body:
<<place e_generic_leave>>

[[“It’s a shame but we most move forward” |A6$d]]

title: A4A$d@pg:3
body:
<<place a4a_losangeles>>

[[“Head towards Mexico” |A5$e]]

title: A12&sci@fg:2
body:
<<place e_generic_gain>>

[[“Our new friend will be a priceless asset for the group in the future” |A13$e%gain:1]]

title: A13$e%gain:1
body:
<<place a13_mexico>>

[[“The group decides to visit what seems like the largest smoke pillar.” |B1]]

title: A13$e@fg:2
body:
<<place a13_mexico>>

[[“The group decides to visit what seems like the largest smoke pillar.” |B1]]

title: C1
body:
<<place c1_brazil>>

[[Keep going |C2$d]]

title: C2$d
body:
<<place c2_brazil>>

[[“The group sets up a small camp with the many branches surrounding them. They gather many of the surrounding berries and plants, enjoying themselves with a needed rest and a dinner. They decide to settle within the area for the time being, in which they will continue their path to Fortaleza afterwards.” |C3$e@fg:2]]

title: C3$e@fg:2
body:
<<place c3_theamazon>>

[[“Armed with a gun and some primitive weapons, the group decides to fight back. They’ve decided they’ve invested too much in gathering all the food to just simply give it away to the bears.” |C4A]]
[[“The group decides it’s not worth the trouble fighting back the bears, deciding to instead ditch their camp, and continue on with their journey to Fortaleza” |C4B]]

title: C4A
body:
<<place c4a_theamazon>>

[[“We couldn’t even give them a proper burial…” Keep moving |C5$d%die:4]]

title: C4B
body:
<<place c4b_theamazon>>

[[“We’re going to starve without that food...” Continue forwards |C5$d@fg:5]]

title: C5$d@fg:5
body:
<<place c5_brazil>>

[[We are getting oh so close |C6$d]]

title: C5$d%die:4
body:
<<place c5_brazil>>

[[We are getting oh so close |C6$d]]

title: C6$d
body:
<<place c6_brazil>>

[[Keep going |C7$f]]

title: C7$f
body:
<<place c7_urdaneta>>

[[Continue |C8$d]]

title: C8$d
body:
<<place c8_urdaneta>>

[[“The group decides that rerouting west and crossing directly through the Rio Coco river would only delay them in their path to Fortaleza. The group decides it would be best to venture through the thin beams that remain of the bridge.” |C9$d%die:2]]
[[“The group takes the next safest option available, despite it potentially prolonging their journey. The group reroutes west towards the base of the Rio Coco river.” |C9$d@pl:3]]

title: C9$d%die:2
body:
<<place c9_urdaneta>>

[[They scream in shock as the two fall to their death, and their companions wail back. Many look away before their bodies hit the ground with a visceral thud |C10$e]]

title: C9$d@pl:3
body:
<<place c9a_urdaneta>>

[[We’re getting closer |C10$e]]

title: C10$e
body:
<<place c10_brazil>>

[[“The group decides there is no hope, opting to end their journey here: a group suicide, a painless death.” |C11A*end]]
[[“The group decides to move forward without food or power and let nature decide their fate.” |C11B*end]]

title: B1
body:
<<place b1_mexico>>{{city_guard}}

[[“We’re just passing through, maybe trade and ask some questions” |B2]]

title: C11A*end
body:
<<place c11a_brazil>>

[[They once again have a sense of direction, deciding against suicide and instead head east, following the lights to Fortaleza. |C12]]

title: C11B*end
body:
<<place c11b_brazil>>

[[They head eastwards, following the lights to Fortaleza |C12]]

title: C12
body:
<<place c12_fortaleza>>

[[“We’ve made it! We weren’t the only one who sought after Fortaleza, this is the place where we begin anew.” |C13]]

title: C13
body:
<<place c13_fortaleza>>

[[Their frozen journey ends |end]]

title: A9A
body:
<<place e_generic_scavenge>>{{default}}

[[Keep going |A10@bg:3]]

title: B2
body:
<<place b2_mexico>>{{city_guard}}

[[“This place seems like heaven, they have enough food and fuel to accomody everyone” After shaking of the amazement of the city, the group trade their excess clothing for fuel and food |B3@bg:3]]

title: B3@bg:3
body:
<<place b3_mexico>>{{default}}

[[Let them stay |B3A$e%die:4]]
[[Remind them of why they left Santa Barbara and what happened at Las Vegas |B3B$e%die:1]]

title: B3A$e%die:4
body:
<<place e_generic_leave>>

[[“It’s a shame but we most move forward” |B4$e]]

title: B3B$e%die:1
body:
<<place b3b_oaxaca>>

[[“It’s a shame but we most move forward” |B4$e]]

title: B4$e
body:
<<place b4_oaxaca>>{{default}}

[[These dogs are most likely to die soon on their own. We can kill them here to rid of their misery, we can even used them for food. |B4A@fg:4]]
[[These dogs are going to die alone and need someone to take care of them. We should adopt the dogs. |B4A&dog%gain:2]]

title: B4A@fg:4
body:
<<place e_generic_scavenge>>{{default}}

[[Keep going |B5@bg:1]]

title: B4A&dog%gain:2
body:
<<place e_generic_scavenge>>{{default}}

[[Keep going |B5@bg:1]]

title: B5@bg:1
body:
<<place b5_honduras>>{{default}}

[[The group decides to accept their offer and take it as a chance to recover from all the ordeal they have been through. |B5A@bg:-2]]
[[The group does not know anything about these people and decided not to push their luck. The group declines and decide to push on with their mission.  |B6$d]]

title: B5A@bg:-2
body:
<<place b5a_honduras>>{{default}}

[[The group decides to accept their offer and take it as a chance to recover from all the ordeal they have been through. |B6$d]]

title: B6$d
body:
<<place b6_honduras>>{{smuggler}}

[[There’s no real reason to deny him, his info would bring us to Fortaleza the fastest and the group can easily deal with him regardless of what he pulls along the way given our size. |B6A]]

title: B6A
body:
<<place b6a_honduras>>

[[Continue. |B7$d]]

title: B7$d
body:
<<place b7_costarica>>

[[“You see…” tell him the story of the group’s goal and their journey |B7]]
[[“That’s none of your concern” |B7]]

title: B7
body:
<<place b7a_costarica>>

[[“Well it’s my turn on the rounds, goodbye.” Since then, the group tries to avoid talking to the smuggler on their way. |B8$e]]

title: B8$e
body:
<<place b8_panama>>

[[The group grows suspicious, but the navigators seem to acknowledge that this most likely would lead to Brazil. Continue forward. |B9]]

title: B9
body:
<<place b9_tunnel>>{{smuggler}}

[[It looks like we have no choice but to be his “customer”. “We gave you money, what do you want from us?” |B10]]

title: B10
body:
<<place b10_tunnel>>{{smuggler}}

[[Give them our food rations (5)|B11@fl:5]] <<mats_food 5>>
[[Give them our power supply (5)|B11@pl:5]] <<mats_power 5>>
[[We can’t afford to give anything up|B10A]]

title: B10A
body:
<<place b10a_tunnel>>{{smuggler}}

[[We have no real choice. The group deliberates between each other and surprisingly, three of the members volunteer to stay. “Okay deal” |B11%die:3]]

title: B11@fl:5
body:
<<place b11_tunnel>>{{smuggler}}
[[“The group swallows the stress they just experienced and start their long trek in the tunnels” |B12$f]]

title: B11@pl:5
body:
<<place b11_tunnel>>{{smuggler}}
[[“The group swallows the stress they just experienced and start their long trek in the tunnels” |B12$f]]

title: B11%die:3
body:
<<place b11_tunnel>>{{smuggler}}
[[“The group swallows the stress they just experienced and start their long trek in the tunnels” |B12$f]]

title: B12$f
body:
<<place b12_tunnel>>{{default}}

[[“After spending a few hours getting used to the environment and feeding themselves, the group packs up and continue towards Fortaleza.” |B13]]

title: TestNode
B13
body:
<<place b13_tunnel>>{{default}}

[[The scientist found a harvestable conduit, let him try to get them |C1@pg:4]] <<check_scientist 3>>
[[Send the dogs to hunt the rodents |C1@fg:4]] <<check_dogs 3>>
[[“After spending a few hours getting trying to scavenge, the group wasn’t able to get anything” |C1]] <<check_fail 3>>

title: C1@pg:4
body:
<<place c1_brazil>>

[[Keep going |C2$d]]

title: C1@fg:4
body:
<<place c1_brazil>>

[[Keep going |C2$d]]
